languages.text: Техножрецы оперативно развертывают мощную фильтрационную станцию. Очищенная вода имеет странный вкус, но пригодна для питья.
Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.
languages.original_text: Техножрецы оперативно развертывают мощную фильтрационную станцию. Очищенная вода имеет странный вкус, но пригодна для питья.

traits.locale_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.
Those who have lost their minds become prime material for servitor production.
Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.
Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

languages.text: Avec rapidité et efficacité, les technoprêtres installent une puissante usine de traitement des eaux. Si l'eau purifiée a un goût étrange, au moins sa consommation est-elle sans danger.
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

traits.locale_text: Avec rapidité et efficacité, les technoprêtres installent une puissante usine de traitement des eaux. Si l'eau purifiée a un goût étrange, au moins sa consommation est-elle sans danger.

languages.text: 迅速かつ効率的に、技術司祭たちは強力な浄水プラントを設置した。浄化された水は独特の味がするが、少なくとも安全に飲むことができる。
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

traits.locale_text: 迅速かつ効率的に、技術司祭たちは強力な浄水プラントを設置した。浄化された水は独特の味がするが、少なくとも安全に飲むことができる。

languages.text: 技术神甫迅速建起了一座功能完备的净水处理厂。尽管净化过的水有股特殊的味道，但至少可以安全饮用。
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

traits.locale_text: 技术神甫迅速建起了一座功能完备的净水处理厂。尽管净化过的水有股特殊的味道，但至少可以安全饮用。

languages.text: Los tecnosacerdotes preparan una planta de tratamiento de agua poderosa de forma rápida y eficaz. El agua purificada tiene un regusto extraño, pero por lo menos se puede beber.
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

traits.locale_text: Los tecnosacerdotes preparan una planta de tratamiento de agua poderosa de forma rápida y eficaz. El agua purificada tiene un regusto extraño, pero por lo menos se puede beber.

languages.text: Die Techpriester errichten schnell und effizient eine leistungsstarke Wasserverarbeitungsanlage. Das gereinigte Wasser schmeckt etwas sonderbar, man kann es aber zumindest gefahrlos trinken.
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.

traits.locale_text: Die Techpriester errichten schnell und effizient eine leistungsstarke Wasserverarbeitungsanlage. Das gereinigte Wasser schmeckt etwas sonderbar, man kann es aber zumindest gefahrlos trinken.

languages.text: Tekno Rahipler, hızlı ve etkili bir şekilde güçlü bir su arıtma tesisi kurdu. Arıtılmış suyun tuhaf bir tadı olsa da en azından içmesi güvenli.
languages.original_text: Quickly and efficiently, the Tech-Priests set up a powerful water treatment plant. The purified water has a peculiar taste, but at least it is safe to drink.
